text: Ara yara tadera pare esechila tara bale -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera paritrana karo ara amadera bha'i-bandhudera yara dharmabisbase amadera agrabarti rayechena, ara amadera antare kono hinsa-bidbesa rekho na tadera prati yara imana enechena; amadera prabhu! Tumi'i niscaya parama snehamaya, aphuranta phaladata.â€™â€™
